Articles.Content: I see you everywhere ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) Also my most complimented person.
I see you everywhere as well! Your ships are really, really unique, and you're also a very frequent forum poster.

> 
> I see you everywhere as well! Your ships are really, really unique, and you're also a very frequent forum poster.

Neato avatar. Cool quote! Cool name.
You're the loyal Hypetrain driver who rasks for a pay raise or promotion ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
You are a true friend and a great guy to play TF2 with!
You are a very friendly person, and your company builds great replicas!

I only started seeing you recently, yet you're becoming more and more frequent and established in the community. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
You are very friendly, and also a frequent poster! That, plus your account age, makes you a key part of this wonderful community.
Your avatar is cute.
That is perfect advice down in that signature. I got a real kick out of that.
I love you! ![:kiss:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_kiss.gif)
I see you quite often, and I like that avatar a lot!

I've seen you around for a good long while but I don't think we've ever really communicated, gmpd2000. 

I really love everything about your profile: your location (I'm a big fan of Spaceballs too), your Twitter (I have something sarcastic for that as well), and even your signature! Though I have an absurd load of Reputation and don't give it out nearly as often as I would like, I still agree with the sentiment there.

Oh, and I'm glad you're aerodynamically stable. I have [one of these t-shirts](http://rlv.zcache.com/unstable_shirt-r4f3f54f6e360405daa4c33077ad72b0c_8041a_1200.jpg?view_padding=%5B0.452380952380952%2C0%2C0.452380952380952%2C0%5D) around somewhere... I need to wear it more often. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

-Upsilon

Upsilon, you're a very, very good and friendly poster and speak out your thoughts really kindly, even if people personally attack you, and I applaud you for that - And I've known you ever since you joined the forums. Also, you started many legendary threads, such as the Light-Green Group, and such. Also, I like your YouTube channel!

You are a very helpful user who contributes to the forum and game community with meaningful and honest opinions. Also, your avatar is great! And, you are very active and fun to play with in the forum games.
You stole those words from me. Once could definitely say the same thing about you!
Xan (and Sampa)... You both seem of a happy sort, and it's always nice to see love blossom.
Thanks, Wolfe! If you don't already have someone, I hope you can find someone to love as well!

Sampa.. Well, same to you. You and Xan seem to be great online friends together, as well as in World Of Warships! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Ã¢â‚¬â€¹Damnit guys, I want to join!

> 
> Thanks, Wolfe! If you don't already have someone, I hope you can find someone to love as well!

Thanks. As it so happens, I met a gal six years ago and have been married for over five years.

Edited for clarity.
Congratulations (albeit late) are in order!
Good job on your post count!
I like the dog avatar. Is that pup yours?
You are a nice user in the forum games and in other places, with a witty signature and many compliments to give.
Alphasus, i like your signature, reminds me of how much I want to do dogfighting with dmp!
